segment.source: The goal of deployment planning is to help you successfully and efficiently deploy Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) so that it does not disrupt the user experience or the network.
segment.target: The goal of deployment planning is to help you successfully and efficiently deploy Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) so that it does not disrupt the user experience or the network.

segment.source: There are a number of different deployment configurations and prerequisites that you must consider before you create your deployment plan.
segment.target: There are a number of different deployment configurations and prerequisites that you must consider before you create your deployment plan.

segment.source: This section includes information that can help you gather the necessary information to formulate a deployment plan that best meets your business requirements.
segment.target: This section includes information that can help you gather the necessary information to formulate a deployment plan that best meets your business requirements.

segment.source: Provides prerequisites and recommended network configurations for UE-V.
segment.target: Provides prerequisites and recommended network configurations for UE-V.

segment.source: Lists the operating systems and computer configurations that are required for UE-V.
segment.target: Lists the operating systems and computer configurations that are required for UE-V.

segment.source: Includes the following topics which provide specific guidance on UE-V configuration:
segment.target: Includes the following topics which provide specific guidance on UE-V configuration:

segment.source: Planning Which Applications to Synchronize with UE-V 1.0 – specifies whether to use the default Microsoft settings location templates or to deploy custom templates that are created with the UE-V Generator.
segment.target: Planning Which Applications to Synchronize with UE-V 1.0 – specifies whether to use the default Microsoft settings location templates or to deploy custom templates that are created with the UE-V Generator.

segment.source: Planning for Custom Template Deployment for UE-V 1.0 – provides options for creation and deployment of custom settings location templates.
segment.target: Planning for Custom Template Deployment for UE-V 1.0 – provides options for creation and deployment of custom settings location templates.

segment.source: Planning for UE-V Configuration Methods – helps you decide how to configure the UE-V Agent and manage settings synchronization.
segment.target: Planning for UE-V Configuration Methods – helps you decide how to configure the UE-V Agent and manage settings synchronization.

segment.source: Provides a list of steps to plan, deploy, and manage UE-V.
segment.target: Provides a list of steps to plan, deploy, and manage UE-V.

segment.source: Getting Started With User Experience Virtualization 1.0
segment.target: Getting Started With User Experience Virtualization 1.0
